text: I will put this out again today as @Mike_Pence is trending for asking governors to lie about rising #coronavirus cases.  He lied to me in Iowa on January 30th when he claimed not to understand that #Medicaid blocks grants would hurt my patients. Apparently lying is in his nature. https://t.co/zxnJHiCNDS
